abstract: Republican presidential candidate Herman Cain adopts as his theme song I Am America, anti-establishment anthem written by Michael Branch and recorded by his wife Krista; song resonates with Tea Party members.
snippet: A song picked up by the campaign of Herman Cain has personal resonances for the singer-songwriter team behind it.
lead_paragraph: A song picked up by the campaign of Herman Cain has personal resonances for the singer-songwriter team behind it.

headline.main: Song Adopted by Cain’s Campaign Also Aims to Be a Tea Party Anthem
headline.print_headline: Song Adopted by Cain’s Campaign Also Aims to Be a Tea Party Anthem
headline.seo: Krista Branch’s ‘I Am America’ Aims to Be Tea Party Anthem
